verses.verse: Paul <WG3972>, an apostle <WG652> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> through <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> Timothy <WG5095> our brother <WG80>,

having heard <WG191> of your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>, and <WG2532> of the love <WG26> which ye have toward <WG1519> all <WG3956> the saints <WG40>,

because <WG1223> of the hope <WG1680> which is laid up <WG606> for you <WG5213> in <WG1722> the heavens <WG3772>, whereof <WG3739> ye heard before <WG4257> in <WG1722> the word <WG3056> of the truth <WG225> of the gospel <WG2098>,

which is come <WG3918> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>; even as <WG2531> it is also in <WG1722> all <WG3956> the world <WG2889> bearing fruit <WG2592> and <WG2532> increasing <WG2531>, as it doth in <WG1722> you <WG5213> also <WG2532>, since <WG575> the day <WG2250> ye heard <WG191> and <WG2532> knew <WG1921> the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> in <WG1722> truth <WG225>;

who <WG3588> also <WG2532> declared <WG1213> unto us <WG2254> your <WG5216> love <WG26> in <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151>.

For <WG1223> this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> we <WG2249> also <WG2532>, since <WG575> the day <WG2250> we heard <WG191> it <WG3973>, do not <WG3756> cease <WG3973> to pray <WG4336> and <WG2532> make request <WG154> for <WG5228> you <WG5216>, that <WG2443> ye may be filled with <WG4137> the knowledge <WG1922> of his <WG846> will <WG2307> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> spiritual <WG4152> wisdom <WG4678> and <WG2532> understanding <WG4907>,

4043, Romans9 to walk <WG4043> worthily <WG516> of the Lord <WG2962> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> pleasing <WG699>, bearing fruit <WG2592> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041>, and <WG2532> increasing <WG837> in <WG1519> the knowledge <WG1922> of God <WG2316>;

giving thanks <WG2168> unto the Father <WG3962>, who made <WG2427> us <WG2248> meet <WG2427> to <WG1519> be partakers <WG3310> of the inheritance <WG2819> of the saints <WG40> in <WG1722> light <WG5457>;

who <WG3739> delivered <WG4506> us <WG2248> out <WG1537> of the power <WG1849> of darkness <WG4655>, and <WG2532> translated <WG3179> us into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of the Son <WG5207> of his <WG846> love <WG26>;
in <WG1722> whom <WG3739> we have <WG2192> our redemption <WG629>, the forgiveness <WG859> of our sins <WG266>:
who <WG3739> is <WG2076> the image <WG1504> of the invisible <WG517> God <WG2316>, the firstborn <WG4416> of all <WG3956> creation <WG2937>;

for <WG3754> in <WG1722> him <WG846> were <WG2936> all things <WG3956> created <WG2936>, in <WG1722> the heavens <WG3772> and <WG2532> upon the earth <WG1093>, things visible <WG3707> and <WG2532> things invisible <WG517>, whether <WG1535> thrones <WG2362> or <WG1535> dominions <WG2963> or <WG1535> principalities <WG746> or <WG1535> powers <WG1849>; all things <WG3956> have been created <WG2936> through <WG1223> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> him <WG846>;

And <WG2532> he <WG846> is <WG2076> the head <WG2776> of the body <WG4983>, the church <WG1577>: who <WG3739> is <WG2076> the beginning <WG746>, the firstborn <WG4416> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>; that <WG2443> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> things he <WG846> might <WG1096> have the preeminence <WG4409>.
For <WG3754> it was the good pleasure <WG2106> of the Father that in <WG1722> him <WG846> should <WG2730> all <WG3956> the fulness <WG4138> dwell <WG2730>;

and <WG2532> through <WG1223> him to reconcile <WG604> all things <WG3956> unto <WG1519> himself <WG846>, having made peace <WG1517> through <WG1223> the blood <WG129> of his <WG846> cross <WG4716>; through <WG1223> him <WG846>, I say <WG1535>, whether things <WG3588> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>, or <WG1535> things <WG3588> in <WG1909> the heavens <WG3772>.
And <WG2532> you <WG5209>, being in <WG1271> time past <WG4218> alienated <WG526> and <WG2532> enemies <WG2190> in <WG1271> your mind <WG1271> in your evil <WG4190> works <WG2041>,

yet now <WG3570> hath he reconciled <WG604> in <WG1722> the body <WG4983> of his <WG846> flesh <WG4561> through <WG1223> death <WG2288>, to present <WG3936> you <WG5209> holy <WG40> and <WG2532> without blemish <WG299> and <WG2532> unreproveable <WG410> before <WG2714> him <WG846>:

if <WG1489> so be that ye continue in <WG1961> the faith <WG4102>, grounded <WG2311> and <WG2532> stedfast <WG1476>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> moved away <WG3334> from <WG575> the hope <WG1680> of the gospel <WG2098> which <WG3739> ye heard <WG191>, which was preached <WG2784> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> creation <WG2937> under <WG5259> heaven <WG3772>; whereof <WG3739> I <WG1473> Paul <WG3972> was made <WG1096> a minister <WG1249>.

Now <WG3568> I <WG3739> rejoice <WG5463> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> sufferings <WG3804> for <WG5228> your <WG5216> sake <WG2532>, and fill up <WG466> on my part that which is lacking <WG5303> of the afflictions <WG2347> of Christ <WG5547> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> flesh <WG4561> for <WG5228> his <WG846> body <WG4983>'s sake <WG5228>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> the church <WG1577>;

whereof <WG3739> I <WG1473> was made <WG1096> a minister <WG1249>, according to <WG2596> the dispensation <WG3622> of God <WG2316> which was given <WG1325> me <WG3427> to <WG1519> you-ward <WG5209>, to fulfil <WG4137> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316>,

even the mystery <WG3466> which hath been hid <WG613> for <WG575> ages <WG165> and <WG2532> generations <WG1074>: but <WG1161> now <WG3570> hath it been manifested <WG5319> to <WG40> his <WG846> saints <WG40>,

to whom <WG3739> God <WG2316> was pleased <WG2309> to make known <WG1107> what <WG5101> is the riches <WG4149> of the glory <WG1391> of this <WG5127> mystery <WG3466> among <WG1722> the Gentiles <WG1484>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> Christ <WG5547> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>, the hope <WG1680> of glory <WG1391>:

whom <WG3739> we <WG2249> proclaim <WG2605>, admonishing <WG3560> every <WG3956> man <WG444> and <WG2532> teaching <WG1321> every <WG3956> man <WG444> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> wisdom <WG4678>, that <WG2443> we may present <WG3936> every <WG3956> man <WG444> perfect <WG5046> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>;
whereunto <WG1519> I <WG2872> labor <WG2872> also <WG2532>, striving <WG75> according to <WG2596> his <WG846> working <WG1753>, which worketh <WG1754> in <WG1722> me <WG1698> mightily <WG1411>.
